Question: The February 2007 issue of Interview magazine was devoted entirely to this person.
Hints: This person added that she began to recognize her "inner being" during her adulthood:.
National Velvet grossed over US$4 million and MGM signed this person to a new long-term contract.
MGM cast this person in Lassie Come Home (1943) with child star Roddy McDowall, with whom she would share a lifelong friendship.
